description: Encrypted drive is unlocked in a quiet back room of Bar 101, revealing the genuine Halden hologram and verification keys.
Haldens message is broadcast citywide from public screens, with proof of authenticity spreading through trusted networks.

Sudden holographic projections of Halden appear across the city, announcing, 'This was never governance. It was conditioning.' Citizens record and share the broadcast, triggering widespread confusion and debate.
Council urgently declares the hologram a 'sophisticated deepfake'. Many refuse to believe the official line, with cracks in public trust spreading. Factions quietly blame each other for sabotage.
Innovators commission independent analysis to verify the source. The resultmixed signals and digital watermarks both genuine and falsifiedfurther splits the Council, stalling all cooperation.
Citizen groups host mass forums to debate the systems real nature. Civil unrest rises as BCI enforcement wanes in some sectors. Council authority is publicly challenged for the first time in years.
